item.description:
This is a Meetup for the Flextras Friday Lunch, live online weekly Q&A recording that occurs every Friday at 1pm EST using Acrobat Connect.
You can join in at http://experts.na3.acrobat.com/flextras/ or check what time this occurs in your time zone at: http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?hour=13&min=0&sec=0&p1=98 .
You can also follow us on twitter at http://www.twitter.com/flextras/
Note: This is an on-line only group, there is no in-person meeting associated this meetup. The Connect room won't usually become active until about 10 minutes before the presentation starts.
item.name: Flextras Friday Lunch
